column2: it's definitely an awesome restaurant where you want to try pretty much everything on the menu. I can't really think of any other places that have sides that are quite like these. I strongly suggest you come with friends and sample their food. Next time
column3: I'm going to try their salads. They're probably healthier than the sandwiches. With dressing
column4: they might not be. But... it's the thought that counts.
